ru.ifmo.ctddev.gizatullin.implementor

Class Implementor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.ifmo.ctddev.gizatullin.implementor.Implementor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Impler, JarImpler

    public class Implementor
extends Object
implements Impler, JarImpler
    This class implements class or interface you provide. This class can implement only non-static and non-private classes and interfaces with non-private constructors.
    See Also:
    Impler, JarImpler

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Main method to execute.

        If the first arguments is "-jar", tries to implement "class" as the second argument in the given jar-file - the third argument. Otherwise, tries to implement "class" as the first argument, "root" - file to locate into as second.

        Parameters:
        args - arguments from the command line
        See Also:
        implementJar(java.lang.Class<?>, java.io.File), implement(java.lang.Class<?>, java.io.File), ImplerException

      • implement

        public void implement(Class<?> c,
                      File root)
               throws ImplerException
        Creates a file that implements or extends interface or class.

        Creates a file that implements or extends interface or class. Output file is created in the folder that corresponds to the package of given class or interface. Output file contains java class, that implements or extends given class or interface and compiles without errors. Class and interface must not contain generics.

        Specified by:
        implement in interface Impler
        Parameters:
        c - class or interface will be implemented
        root - directory to create class's implementation
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if c or root is null, c is final or has no non-private constructors

      • printClass

        private static void printClass(Class c,
                               PrintWriter out)
        Prints given class to PrintWriter.

        Prints class c to PrintWriter out, with all it's constructors, methods and their exceptions, meanwhile storing them in the HashMap.

        Parameters:
        c - class to print
        out - PrintWriter to print to
        See Also:
        putProtectedMethods(java.lang.Class, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.reflect.Method>), inappropriateModifiers(int), printConstructor(java.lang.reflect.Constructor, java.io.PrintWriter, java.lang.String), printMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method, java.io.PrintWriter), getHash(java.lang.reflect.Method), PrintWriter, Modifier

      • inappropriateModifiers

        private static boolean inappropriateModifiers(int modifiers)
        Checks modifiers for possibility to implement.

        Returns true if the integer argument includes the private or final modifier, false otherwise.

        Parameters:
        modifiers - modifiers to check
        Returns:
        true if modifiers is final or private, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Modifier

      • putProtectedMethods

        private static void putProtectedMethods(Class c,
                                        Map<String,Method> map)
        Puts methods of the superclasses into the map.

        Recursive method to look through superclasses of Class c and put methods to map, if the modifiers of them are appropriate.

        Parameters:
        c - class to get methods from
        map - map to put methods to
        See Also:
        Map, Class.getDeclaredMethods(), getHash(java.lang.reflect.Method), putProtectedMethods(java.lang.Class, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.reflect.Method>)

      • getHash

        private static String getHash(Method method)
        Returns hash of the method.

        Gets hash-like string from method and it's parameters.

        Parameters:
        method - method to get hash from
        Returns:
        String that represents this method ans it's parameters
        See Also:
        Executable.getParameters()

      • printConstructor

        private static void printConstructor(Constructor constructor,
                                     PrintWriter out,
                                     String simpleName)
        Prints given constructor of the class to PrintWriter.

        Method to print constructor of the class to the PrintWriter out with this simpleName. Includes parameters and exceptions if necessary.

        Parameters:
        constructor - Constructor to print
        out - PrintWriter to print to
        simpleName - simple name of the class
        See Also:
        PrintWriter, Constructor, printParameters(java.lang.reflect.Parameter[], java.io.PrintWriter), printExceptions(java.lang.Class[], java.io.PrintWriter)

      • printMethod

        private static void printMethod(Method method,
                                PrintWriter out)
        Prints method to the give PrintWriter.

        Prints method to given PrintWriter out, with all it's exceptions, parameters and return type if necessary.

        Parameters:
        method - method to print
        out - PrintWriter to print to
        See Also:

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar(Class<?> c,
                         File jarFile)
                  throws ImplerException
        Implements given class and puts in the jar-file.

        Creates temporary directory and generates implementation of the class c with the name "classname" + "Impl.class". Puts this implementation and Manifest into given jarFile.

        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface JarImpler
        Parameters:
        c - Class to implement to
        jarFile - file to print to
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if c or jarFile is null, or if exitCode of compilation of the implementing class is not 0
        See Also:
        implement(java.lang.Class<?>, java.io.File), createJar(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String), compile(java.io.File, java.lang.String)

      • createJar

        private static void createJar(String root,
                              String jarFile,
                              String classFile)
        Packs the class in the given jar-file.

        Puts Manifest and compiled class-file classFile in the the given jarFile in the given directory root.

        Parameters:
        root - directory to locate jarFile
        jarFile - JarFile to write to
        classFile - String representing classFile of the Class
        See Also:
        Manifest, IOUtils

      • compile

        private static int compile(File root,
                           String file)
        Returns result of the compiling.

        Compiles the given file in the directory root and returns the exit code of the compilation

        Parameters:
        root - directory where the file is located
        file - name of the file to compile
        Returns:
        resulting int of the compiling
        See Also:
        JavaCompiler, ToolProvider
